name: ech.OS
description:
At ech.OS we preserve your legacy for years to come. ech.OS You, tomorrow.

ech.OS Is a twine game that uses the "error" function of your web browser. Do not be alarmed if you receive an error while playing. This can be a difficult game, but you can log in.

Stumped?

Hint#1 - Usernames are case sensitive.

Hint#2 - The password is all lowercase and has a space.

Want the answer? head over to my webpage.

Don't forget to rate and comment!
